mapper.sql: U_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, MOBILE, CREATE_TIME, LOGIN_COUNT, LAST_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into USER (U_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, MOBILE, CREATE_TIME, LOGIN_COUNT, LAST_TIME) values (#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update USER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where U_ID = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update USER set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where U_ID = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
